leaveMaria.text: She seems uncomfortable, better leave her alone for now.

root.text: Sorry,  i'm in a hurry, i'll be late if i don't get in.

notTalked.text: Hi, I was reading the bulletin board.
There're intresting stuff sometimes, and someone has been leaving messages, stickers and riddles lately.
Have a look at it at least once a day, get used to it.

talked.text: Remember to look at the boards, sometimes you can find intresting things.
